list.title: MainPage.bgm
list.description: Background music audio.

list.title: MainPage.enterButton
list.description: DOM access to mini-app navigation button on the side panel.

list.title: MainPage.infoButton
list.description: DOM access to info display button.

list.title: MainPage.instructionTxt
list.description: DOM access to instruction text shown on side panel.

list.title: MainPage.locationName
list.description: Stores the selected location name.

list.title: MainPage.locations
list.description: List of 4 DOM access to map locations.

list.title: MainPage.musicButton
list.description: DOM access to music enable button.

list.title: MainPage.musicEnabled
list.description: Stores the current state of main page music.

list.title: MainPage.musicImage
list.description: Music on/off image element (part of general UI)

list.title: MainPage.panelLayout
list.description: DOM access to side panel layout grid.

list.title: MainPage.panelState
list.description: Stores the current state of side panel. Default to 'inactive'. Turn to 'active' when side panel open.

list.title: MainPage.previousLocationName
list.description: Stores the previous selected location name.

list.title: MainPage.showInfo
list.description: Stores the current state of info screen.

list.title: MainPage.sideAudio
list.description: Side panel open/switch/close sound effect.

list.title: MainPage.sidePanel
list.description: DOM access to side panel.

list.title: MiniApps.Cartomancy.APP_NAME
list.description: Name of the Cartomancy app.

list.title: MiniApps.Cartomancy.cancelDefault
list.description: Allows the card to be hovered and eventually dropped into the respective container

list.title: MiniApps.Cartomancy.cardsPicked
list.description: Counter when 3 cards are picked.

list.title: MiniApps.Cartomancy.dragStart
list.description: Keeps track of information when a card is begun to be dragged. Called when starting to hold a card. Final place where the card is dropped compares information set here.

list.title: MiniApps.Cartomancy.dropped
list.description: Keeps track of information when a card is begun to be dragged. Called when starting to hold a card. Final place where the card is dropped compares information set here.

list.title: MiniApps.Cartomancy.engine
list.description:
Instance of the FortuneEngine class. Reads the JSON file 'cartomancy.json'
and generates 3 random cards.

list.title: MiniApps.Cartomancy.i
list.description: Card selector counter.

list.title: MiniApps.Cartomancy.musicImage
list.description: Music on/off image element (part of general UI)

list.title: MiniApps.Cartomancy.organizeCards
list.description:
Sets up the fortune and the place for the fortune. Cleans up the element
(assuming it has 1 child) where the cards are picked and creates and adds the elements in the structure shown below. It also makes the bg image transparent.

information

list.title: MiniApps.Cartomancy.readCards
list.description:
Begins reading the three tarot cards selected by the reader.

Overrides styling to display cards in a row by adding class and removes read fortune button. Then loops through each of the three fortunes and adds them through calling organizeCards() for each fortune.

list.title: MiniApps.Cartomancy.targetName
list.description: Name of container that a card is dragged to.

list.title: MiniApps.FortuneStick.APP_NAME
list.description: Name of the Fortune Stick app.

list.title: MiniApps.FortuneStick.bgm
list.description: Background music object

list.title: MiniApps.FortuneStick.cardElements
list.description: List of all card class elements

list.title: MiniApps.FortuneStick.categories
list.description: Array of fortune stick categories.

list.title: MiniApps.FortuneStick.chooseCardAnimation
list.description:
Animates category card selection, enabling choose-card class on selected
card element for CSS keyframe animation

list.title: MiniApps.FortuneStick.displayFortune
list.description:
Displays the fortune received by FortuneEngine. Plays the audio for receiving fortune,
and animates the text shown with a typing animation

list.title: MiniApps.FortuneStick.engine
list.description:
Instance of the FortuneEngine class. Reads the JSON file `fortune_stick.json`
and generates a random fortune stick object.

list.title: MiniApps.FortuneStick.infoButton
list.description: Info button element (part of general UI)

list.title: MiniApps.FortuneStick.musicButton
list.description: Music on/off button element (part of general UI)

list.title: MiniApps.FortuneStick.musicEnabled
list.description: Keeps track of the music on/off state.

list.title: MiniApps.FortuneStick.musicImage
list.description: Music on/off image element (part of general UI)

list.title: MiniApps.FortuneStick.resetButton
list.description: Reset button element (when clicked, lets user get another fortune)

list.title: MiniApps.FortuneStick.selectCategory
list.description:
Transitions from category selection to displaying received fortune. Uses the
chooseCardAnimation function to animate transition, and displayFortune function
to animate displaying the received fortune.

list.title: MiniApps.FortuneStick.selectedCategory
list.description: The selected fortune stick category.

list.title: MiniApps.FortuneStick.showInfo
list.description: Keeps track of whether the info panel is shown.

list.title: MiniApps.FortuneStick.TYPING_SPEED
list.description: Sets the typing speed for the interpretation text reveal

list.title: MiniApps.Molybdomancy.actionButtonHoverSoundEffect
list.description: Melt button hover sound effect object

list.title: MiniApps.Molybdomancy.actionButtonPressSoundEffect
list.description: Melt button press sound effect object

list.title: MiniApps.Molybdomancy.animate
list.description: Starts melting animation.

list.title: MiniApps.Molybdomancy.bgm
list.description: Background music object

list.title: MiniApps.Molybdomancy.cooldownTime
list.description:
Defines how long the cooldown time for the animation is relative
to the animation length (morphTime)

list.title: MiniApps.Molybdomancy.dt
list.description: Determine difference of time in seconds from last start time to newTime

list.title: MiniApps.Molybdomancy.elts
list.description:
Object that contains references to the start and end strings
used in the melting animation

list.title: MiniApps.Molybdomancy.engine
list.description:
Instance of the FortuneEngine class. Reads the JSON file 'molybdomancy.json'
and generates a random shape that the tin melts into.

list.title: MiniApps.Molybdomancy.infoButton
list.description: Info button element (part of general UI)

list.title: MiniApps.Molybdomancy.meltButton
list.description: The melt button (press it to start the melting animation)

list.title: MiniApps.Molybdomancy.meltButtonState
list.description: State of the melt button - cycles between "melt" and "result"

list.title: MiniApps.Molybdomancy.meltSoundEffect
list.description: Melting sound effect object

list.title: MiniApps.Molybdomancy.morphTime
list.description: Defines how long the melting animation is (in seconds)

list.title: MiniApps.Molybdomancy.musicButton
list.description: Music on/off button element (part of general UI)

list.title: MiniApps.Molybdomancy.musicEnabled
list.description: Keeps track of the music on/off state.

list.title: MiniApps.Molybdomancy.musicImage
list.description: Music on/off image element (part of general UI)

list.title: MiniApps.Molybdomancy.newTime
list.description: Contains new start time from the beginning of the animation.

list.title: MiniApps.Molybdomancy.result
list.description: Stores random shape object generated by FortuneEngine

list.title: MiniApps.Molybdomancy.resultTextMeaning
list.description: HTML element that contains the resulting shape meaning

list.title: MiniApps.Molybdomancy.resultTextShape
list.description: HTML element that contains the resulting shape name

list.title: MiniApps.Molybdomancy.showInfo
list.description: Keeps track of whether the info panel is shown.

list.title: MiniApps.Molybdomancy.textIndex
list.description: Current string the animation morphs from

list.title: MiniApps.Molybdomancy.texts
list.description: Array of strings used in the melting tin animation

list.title: MiniApps.Molybdomancy.time
list.description: Stores the start time for the animation

list.title: MiniApps.YinYangCoin.actionButtonPressSound
list.description: Action button press sound effect object

list.title: MiniApps.YinYangCoin.bgm
list.description: Background music object

list.title: MiniApps.YinYangCoin.buttonElement
list.description: Action button element ("Start" / "Toss Coins" / "Get Result" button)

list.title: MiniApps.YinYangCoin.character
list.description: Hexagram Chinese Character element

list.title: MiniApps.YinYangCoin.coinDisplay
list.description: 3 Yin Yang Coin container element

list.title: MiniApps.YinYangCoin.coinResult
list.description: Randomly generated 3-coin toss result

list.title: MiniApps.YinYangCoin.coins
list.description: List of coin elements

list.title: MiniApps.YinYangCoin.contentGrid
list.description:
Main content element container (i.e. contains instructions heading + image
and interpretation result)

list.title: MiniApps.YinYangCoin.engine
list.description:
Instance of the FortuneEngine class. Reads the JSON file `yin_yang_coin.json`
and generates random 3-coin tosses.

list.title: MiniApps.YinYangCoin.flipSound
list.description: Coin flip sound effect object

list.title: MiniApps.YinYangCoin.fortuneRevealSound
list.description: Fortune reveal sound effect object

list.title: MiniApps.YinYangCoin.gridList
list.description:
Array of all side grid elements (six in total for each line of the hexagram
that is generated)

list.title: MiniApps.YinYangCoin.hexagram
list.description: Resulting hexagram object

list.title: MiniApps.YinYangCoin.hexagramIndex
list.description:
After each 3-coin toss, if the toss matched "Yin", or 0, then the index is unchanged.
If the toss matched "Yang", or 1, then we add 2^i to hexagramIndex where i is the
how many coins have been tossed thus far - 1 (e.g., if this is the first coin toss, then
i is 0)

list.title: MiniApps.YinYangCoin.hexagrams
list.description: Array of the 64 hexagram objects.

list.title: MiniApps.YinYangCoin.infoButton
list.description: Info button element (part of general UI)

list.title: MiniApps.YinYangCoin.instructionImg
list.description: Instruction image element (possible coin result combinations)

list.title: MiniApps.YinYangCoin.instructionTxt
list.description: Instruction text heading element

list.title: MiniApps.YinYangCoin.intepretationTxt
list.description: Interpretation text element (where hexagram meaning is shown)

list.title: MiniApps.YinYangCoin.jsonFile
list.description:
Contents of the ying_yang_coin.json file.
Contains the list of 64 hexagram objects and the 8 possible 3-coin tosses

list.title: MiniApps.YinYangCoin.lineImg
list.description:
Line image element (instructions image that appears in the Line Representation
sidebar)

list.title: MiniApps.YinYangCoin.lineRevealSound
list.description: Line reveal sound effect object

list.title: MiniApps.YinYangCoin.lineTxt
list.description: Line text element (sidebar heading)

list.title: MiniApps.YinYangCoin.musicButton
list.description: Music on/off button element (part of general UI)

list.title: MiniApps.YinYangCoin.musicEnabled
list.description: Keeps track of the music on/off state.

list.title: MiniApps.YinYangCoin.musicImage
list.description: Music on/off image element (part of general UI)

list.title: MiniApps.YinYangCoin.powerOfTwo
list.description: Stores the current power of 2 (shifted once to the left in each iteration)

list.title: MiniApps.YinYangCoin.showInfo
list.description: Keeps track of whether the info panel is shown.

list.title: MiniApps.YinYangCoin.tossCounter
list.description:
Counter to keep track of how many times the user tossed 3 coins.
Once this reaches 6, the user should be prompted to get their fortune.

list.title: Utility.FortuneEngine
list.description: Creates a FortuneEngine object.

list.title: Utility.FortuneEngine#db_dump
list.description: Prints the outcomes array to the console.

list.title: Utility.FortuneEngine#db_reader
list.description:
Initializes this FortuneEngine object.
Populates the outcomes field with the contents of the JSON file.

list.title: Utility.FortuneEngine#get_json_contents
list.description: Returns the contents of the JSON file that has been read via db_reader()

list.title: Utility.FortuneEngine#get_outcomes
list.description: Returns the outcomes array in this FortuneEngine object.

list.title: Utility.FortuneEngine#get_random_subset
list.description:
Randomly selects num_objects objects from the outcome array and returns the
subarray.

list.title: Utility.JSON_OUTCOMES_FIELD
list.description:
Expected field name in the mini-app's JSON file that contains
the array of outcome objects for that mini-app.

list.title: Utility.setMusicState
list.description: Sets the state (on / off) of the background music
